pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7*
  • Processor: 2.4Ghz*
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX660 or equivalent*
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: * I'm pretty sure the min spec should be much lower than this, but I don't have a hardware compatibility lab on hand. XP is probably fine, and I suspect you could run a GPU half as powerful. If you do use a machine below this spec, and the game runs okay for you, could you let me know? Thanks <3

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Storage: 300 MB available space
